In memory of Coco the cat and Dash the turtle, who passed during development.
This is an animal card, and is affected by effects which target animal cards.
This is an gang card, and is affected by effects which target gang cards.
Twitch Streamers can gain subscribers, gaining that many followers at the start of combat. You gain 5 gold any time you gain a Subscriber.
Twitch Streamers have followers during combat, starting with an amount equal to their Subscriber count. Some cards become more powerful if you have many followers.
This card is popular with viewers and will gain you Followers for playing it.
Choose 1 cards will present multiple options when played. If an option requires a target, the target must be chosen as part of playing the initial card.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
